input_email_body:
Subject:  Urgent Assistance Needed for Data Breach Issue

I am reporting a significant problem with our system, a data breach has occurred, leading to unauthorized access to patient records You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. This happened because of inadequate encryption and outdated software. Despite my efforts to update Kubernetes and strengthen firewall rules, the issue continues. I would be very grateful if you could offer immediate help to address this issue. Please inform me of the steps I should take next. Thank you for your support and attention. My name is David Kim.
